entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
